name: Cold Runner
description:
Cold Runner is a 2D Endless Runner / Platformer game developed in 2 weeks for a Game Jam. Have fun playing and running with this little guy on fire!

This game was developed by:

Matheus Vicente: https://www.linkedin.com/in/matheus-vicente-b87957180/

Pedro Aredes: https://www.linkedin.com/in/pedro-aredes-4b4582105/

Martin Kretzschmar: https://www.linkedin.com/in/martinakretzschmar/

João Pedro Barberino: https://www.linkedin.com/in/joao-pedro-barberino-silva/

Gabriel Alves Freitas: https://www.instagram.com/alvsculpt/
